inscription:
Inscriptions and Sticker

on front side below man's hands, inscribed: [PAT MAY 22, 1877]; on front side on pedestal, engraved: [PAYS FIVE FOR ONE / IF YOU CALL THE NUMBER]; on back side of pedestal, engraved: [28]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [G108 3-5-8 / Guessing Bank / 771857-50 31500 / 51500 / 63400 / M117 AD 72700]
title: Guessing Bank, Man's Figure
